prompt: What are your business hours?
completion: Our business hours are 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.

prompt: Do you offer free shipping?
completion: Yes, we offer free shipping on orders over $50.

prompt: Can I return an item?
completion: Yes, you can return any item within 30 days of purchase.

prompt: What is your return policy?
completion: Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days, with a full refund.

prompt: How long does shipping take?
completion: Shipping usually takes 3-5 business days.

prompt: Do you have a loyalty program?
completion: Yes, we offer a loyalty program that rewards points for every purchase.

prompt: How can I track my order?
completion: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email after shipment.

prompt: What payment methods do you accept?
completion: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

prompt: Do you offer gift cards?
completion: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be purchased on our website.

prompt: Can I change my order after placing it?
completion: If your order hasn't been processed, you can change it by contacting our support team.

prompt: How do I contact customer service?
completion: You can contact customer service via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567.

prompt: What should I do if I received a damaged item?
completion: Please contact our customer service within 48 hours of receipt, and we'll assist you.

prompt: Do you offer international shipping?
completion: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries.

prompt: How can I unsubscribe from your newsletter?
completion: You can unsubscribe by clicking the link at the bottom of any newsletter email.

prompt: Can I pick up my order in-store?
completion: Yes, you can choose in-store pickup at checkout.

prompt: Do you have a size guide?
completion: Yes, we have a size guide available on each product page.

prompt: What is your warranty policy?
completion: We offer a one-year warranty on all our products.

prompt: Are your products eco-friendly?
completion: Yes, we strive to offer eco-friendly products and packaging.

prompt: Do you have a referral program?
completion: Yes, refer a friend and you both get a discount on your next purchase.

prompt: How do I leave a review?
completion: You can leave a review on the product page after making a purchase.

prompt: Can I use multiple discount codes?
completion: No, only one discount code can be applied per order.

prompt: What if I forget my password?
completion: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page.

prompt: What is your privacy policy?
completion: Our privacy policy is available at the bottom of our website.

prompt: How can I view my order history?
completion: You can view your order history by logging into your account and going to 'My Orders'.

prompt: Do you sell wholesale?
completion: Yes, we offer wholesale pricing for bulk orders.

prompt: What if an item is out of stock?
completion: You can sign up for restock notifications on the product page.

prompt: Are there any discounts for students?
completion: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for students with valid ID.

prompt: Do you have a mobile app?
completion: Yes, we have a mobile app available for both iOS and Android.

prompt: Can I gift wrap my order?
completion: Yes, you can choose gift wrapping at checkout.

prompt: What is the best way to care for my purchase?
completion: Care instructions are included with your purchase and also available on our website.

prompt: What types of products do you sell?
completion: We sell clothing, accessories, home goods, and more.

prompt: Do you have physical store locations?
completion: Yes, we have several physical store locations; check our website for details.

prompt: What happens if my order is lost in transit?
completion: If your order is lost, please contact customer service for assistance.

prompt: Can I use my credit card internationally?
completion: Yes, as long as your card supports international transactions.

prompt: Do you offer price matching?
completion: Yes, we offer price matching on identical items.

prompt: What is your exchange policy?
completion: Exchanges are allowed within 30 days of purchase.

prompt: Can I purchase items on sale?
completion: Yes, items on sale can be purchased at the discounted price.

prompt: What if I want to cancel my order?
completion: You can cancel your order if it hasn't been processed yet.

prompt: Do you accept cryptocurrency?
completion: Currently, we do not accept cryptocurrency as a payment method.

prompt: How do I apply for a job?
completion: You can view job openings and apply through our careers page.

prompt: What is the process for product recalls?
completion: If a product is recalled, we will notify affected customers via email.

prompt: Can I change my delivery address?
completion: You can change your delivery address if your order hasn't shipped.

prompt: Do you provide price quotes for custom orders?
completion: Yes, please contact our sales team for custom order quotes.

prompt: Can I see customer reviews before buying?
completion: Yes, customer reviews are available on each product page.

prompt: Do you have an affiliate program?
completion: Yes, we offer an affiliate program for bloggers and influencers.

prompt: What if I receive the wrong item?
completion: Please contact customer service, and we'll send you the correct item.

prompt: How often do you restock items?
completion: Restock frequency varies; sign up for notifications for specific products.

prompt: What is your COVID-19 policy?
completion: We are following all health guidelines to ensure customer safety.

prompt: Do you offer seasonal sales?
completion: Yes, we have seasonal sales throughout the year.

prompt: Can I buy products as a gift?
completion: Yes, you can buy products as gifts and choose gift wrapping at checkout.

prompt: What should I do if I have allergies?
completion: Check product descriptions for allergen information or contact us for details.

prompt: Do you have a mobile-friendly website?
completion: Yes, our website is fully optimized for mobile devices.

prompt: How do I update my account information?
completion: You can update your account information in your account settings.

prompt: What types of materials do you use?
completion: We use a variety of materials; details are provided in product descriptions.

prompt: How can I redeem a coupon?
completion: You can redeem a coupon code at checkout.

prompt: What if I have a question not answered here?
completion: Feel free to contact our customer service team for any inquiries.

prompt: Do you have a blog?
completion: Yes, we have a blog where we share news, tips, and promotions.

prompt: What is your mission statement?
completion: Our mission is to provide high-quality products and excellent customer service.
